skaters.bio: Tony Hawk was born on May 12, 1968 in San Diego, California to Nancy (1925â€“2019) and Frank Peter Rupert Hawk (d. 1995), and was raised in San Diego. He has two older sisters, Pat and Lenore, and an older brother, Steve
